content.rendered: Greetings from the FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul team! We are delighted to introduce ‘INNOPAM,’ our Silver sponsor for FOSS4G Asia 2023 Seoul. The support from ‘INNOPAM’ has been instrumental in enabling us to provide a diverse range of programs and enriching experiences. Witnessing our event come to fruition successfully under the interest and backing of all of you fills us with pride, and we extend our heartfelt gratitude.
